issue.title: translation code for catalog search  are in the wrong file
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

This translation codes are in the administror language file. They are not translate in front office.

COM_EASYSDI_CATALOG_TITLE="Search"
COM_EASYSDI_CATALOG_RESULTS_TITLE="results"
COM_EASYSDI_CATALOG_N_RESULTS_1="%d result"
COM_EASYSDI_CATALOG_N_RESULTS_MORE="%d results"
COM_EASYSDI_CATALOG_SHEET_PROPERTIES_TITLE="Order"
COM_EASYSDI_CATALOG_NO_RESULTS="No result for this search"

**Fixed versions :** 4.5.0
